alert.note: Alert for Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 29 at 8:00PM MST until October 30 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the mid 20s to lower 30s. * WHERE...Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. Residents should prepare and winterize systems on their property for frequent occurrences of subfreezing temperatures this winter.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
